long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for using Diamond Voice Cloud Phone SMS service.

1. Download and install the extension
2. Register the app 
3. Obtain an account number and password from Diamond Voice 

Tips:

- Before you can send your first text message, you will need to add at least one contact to the Address book from the Contact tab.
